sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.id FROM student WHERE student.enroll_year = 2022 AND student.gender = '女' AND student.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM base

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“入学年份（常见问法：22级）”映射，22级对应入学年份2022
根据字段描述“性别（男/女等）”映射，女生对应值为'女'

output.executed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.id FROM student WHERE student.enroll_year = 2022 AND student.gender = '女' AND student.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM base
